title: The Office Landmarks in Scranton PA
name: The Office Landmarks in Scranton PA
description:
A Map by Ean117

Two Scranton natives have created this map to help all you Office fans find landmarks from the show. C'mon along!  We'll be updating as the show goes on.

properties.name: Farley's
properties.description: Posted by Ean117300 Adams Ave. Farley\'s is a local lunch spot. In addition to being mentioned on "The Office," it\'s also where one of my brothers cut off his thumb when working as a prep cook.
